text: Beau Willimon (born October 26, 1977) is an American playwright and screenwriter. Willimon created the Hulu television drama series The First about a group of astronauts going to Mars. He is the creator of the American version of House of Cards. Willimon is president of the Writers Guild of America, East. == References == ==Other websites== * Columbia University Bio - Beau Willimon * * * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:American playwrights Category:American screenwriters Category:American television writers Category:Screenwriters from Missouri Category:Screenwriters from Pennsylvania Category:Writers from Philadelphia Category:Writers from St. Louis, Missouri
title: Beau Willimon
